effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,278 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 191 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 387 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 65,363 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 148,560.
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader
